=== Rationale ===

The Ubuntu Forums web site is dated and does not support current Ubuntu branding guide lines. The desired result is to update the forum software making changes as needed to the CSS and images to present a user experience which blends with the other sites in the community.

* Development Site: http://www.mikesplanet.net/forums/forum.php

=== Assumptions ===

** Members are available to assist as needed.

=== Use Cases ===

** Ubuntu forums uses the <nowiki>[[vbulletin|vBulletin]]</nowiki> solution.

=== Design Considerations ===

** Support branding standards when ever possible.

=== Constraints ===

** Style is limited to what is supported by vBulletin.

=== Workflow ===

** The mailing list will be used to facilitate design discussions.
